summary: This is a lore-friendly, small, but very detailed player home made especially for the rogue/alchemist player (go figure). It is an underground house with some history.
descriptionHtml:
This is a lore-friendly, small, but very detailed player home made especially for the rogue/alchemist player (go figure). It is an underground house with some background history.
I originally made it for my 'goblin' race character so it will have a goblin/orc trend to it, but i loved it so much, i wanted to upload it.

There are two entryways, or as a rogue might consider them, escapeways, so you can ALWAYS stay on he run.

Included in the house are:
Alchemy Table
Weapon Racks
Secret Switches
Weapon Plaques
Bed
Custom named storage containers
Cooking Spit
Bookshelves
Custom Music
and more...

If you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it, then please endorse. Thanks.
author: NIkodemeus
